SHA1 hash

Source: R/sha1.r
sha1_hash.Rd

Creates a SHA1 hash of data using either HMAC or RSA.

sha1_hash(key, string, method = "HMAC-SHA1")

Arguments

key

The key to create the hash with
string

data to securely hash
method

The method to use, either HMAC-SHA1 or RSA-SHA1
